item.title: Cleaning HTML Code in R
item.description: Working at ATLAS involves a lot of student assessment data, including text responses. For certain projects, the data are sent to our team with residual HTML code in the text response strings, for example, It's might appear as It&#39;s, since the HTML code for an apostrophe is denoted by &#39;. To make these responses more readable, it is helpful to clean, or replace, the HTML markup with the equivalent symbols.
